attributes.action: Free parking for all key workers everywhere in UK.
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to make sure that the least thing a Doctor or a teacher has to worry about is where to park their car.
attributes.background: I believe all key workers should be able to park anywhere they find a parking space free of charge when at work. It is useless of us to thank them all for their amazing work they are doing at this very difficult time when they are struggling to find a parking space.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about parking for key workers are a matter for their employers and individual local authorities, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
